item.title: Artificial Intelligence
item.description: I have done an introduction to Artificial Intelligence (AI) course and I want to share my learning experience. This post covers my notes and summaries of the content of the course. History On the early sixties, there was a gathering between several investigators interested on artificial intelligence, neural networks and automats theory as a consequence of the first works made on the field. The following years there was a lot of progress on the field and several programs were design to solve numerous problems:
